column4: ok im in the process ov recovering my drive however it still wont boot  how can i get it to boot so i can log in?
How far do you get before it fails?
What have you tried to use for recovery?
If you have a Live CD, you can try gpart, not to be confused with gparted.
Clarify, are you trying to recover a corrupt partition or are you a dual booter trying to recover an Ubuntu partition masked by Windows?
Oh, THAT type of recovery. I don't know a whole lot about that.
